annotations.description: It's Fall People! And that means coffee cocktails! We're stoked to be sponsored by Mr. Black Coffee Liqueur! For those Barfly fans you'll know that Mr. Black...
annotations.title: Five Favorite Coffee Cocktails feat. Mr. Black

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Mezcal
.75oz (22.5ml) Coffee Liqueur
.5oz (15ml) Cold Espresso
.5oz (15ml) Cola Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Ginger Syrup
2 Dashes Scrappy’s Firewater Bitters
Mint Sprig Garnish

Shake and double strain into collins glass over ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xTow_HLO6DE
title: Afternoon Delight
